reviewText: daughter just loved the first like mike that she was beyond excited to receive the continuation of the story on a different level and loved just as much.  thank you.
seen this movie before and had to add it to my movie collection the kids will enjoy it as well
If you must see this wait until it is a freebie. The first Like Mike was an enjoyable movie. My 11 year old nephew rents movies when visiting and he lost interest in the movie halfway through it.

I was very interested in purchasing part 2 because I had part 1 already. I thought maybe it would be a continuation from the first one with Bow Wow, but this one was totally different. Overall it's a good movie for kids.
Wonderful product!! Worked great!! Bought it and was able to watch it instantly. No glitches in the whole process. I would do it again.

While I enjoyed the original Like Mike, I figured Like Mike 2 would be just as good, but surprisingly was let down. Although it is still cute, with many similarities to the original, it clearly wasn't as good. If you're thinking of buying this movie because the original Like Mike was so good, save your money, because you'll be disappointed.

This is nothing like the first Like Mike.  It's like a TV copy.  Lame.
Lil Bow-wow made the first one much better.
My boys, ages 4 and 6, really enjoyed the movie.  They're really into basketball right now and liked all of the "moves" the main character was able to achieve wearing his "special shoes".

[...]
I was actually surprised by how much I enjoyed this one.  I like how it didn't try to copy line by line the original, or repeat the scenarios or scenes.  It was a nice twist to add the "street ball" nitch too.  The young actors were enjoyable to wach, and the acting was not bad.

All in all, very nice film.

1 star lower than 4, since it went straight to DVD.  Poor marketing for this one.

Recommded.

MC White
Very good copy.
Movie was nothing like the original. Characters you couldn't really care about. This should be $0.99 rental. Not a $2.99 SD rental.

Excellent.
It was purchased for Great Grand Sons which we didn't see until today (12/1/2014) They loved it and what I saw of it I enjoyed also.
In very good condition, bought it for my grandson and he really enjoyed the movie and I did as well.
Got this for a group of little kids, It kept their attention, which is just what I wanted...I'm not a kids movie critic but it seems to do the job and keep them happy/content.

This is another good movie for kids. My grandsons ages 11, 8, and 6 all loved it. They thought Like Mike was a little better than Like Mike 2 but they still loved it and have watched it several times also.

I assumed the "sequel" to Like Mike would pick up where the original movie left off. Wrong !! It is a completely low-budget, poorly acted, badly scripted, rip off of the wonderfully moving original movie. The only reason a gave it one star is because zero stars is not an option
